name: tm49
effect: Teaches Snatch to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Echoed Voice to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Snatch Gen II: Fury Cutter Gen I: Tri Attack)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user steals the effects of any healing or status-changing move the foe attempts to use.
flavor_text.platinum: The user steals the effects of any healing or status-changing move the foe attempts to use.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user steals the effects of any healing or status-changing move the foe attempts to use.
